properties.name: Erg Chebbi (Sahara)
properties.description: Towering golden sand dunes rising to 150m, camel trekking and desert camps

properties.name: Fes Medina
properties.description: World's largest car-free urban area with 9,000 winding alleys and medieval tanneries

properties.name: Ait Benhaddou
properties.description: Fortified ksar (village) and UNESCO site, filming location for Gladiator and Game of Thrones

properties.name: Todra Gorge
properties.description: 300m limestone canyon walls rising dramatically above a narrow palm-lined river

properties.name: Chefchaouen
properties.description: The Blue Pearl - mountain town painted entirely in shades of blue in the Rif Mountains

properties.name: Jemaa el-Fnaa (Marrakech)
properties.description: UNESCO Masterpiece of Oral Heritage, vibrant square with storytellers, musicians, and food stalls
